allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive design specification document

Created detailed design spec covering all features and user flows for the home fitness tracker app including:
- Exercise database structure
- Workout plan generation
- Workout execution interface
- First-time calibration flow
- History tracking
- Progressive overload system
- Data backup and restore
- Complete user flow diagrams
- Screen layouts and wireframes
- Data architecture schemas
- System diagrams

EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update design spec with requested refinements

Changes made:
- Added rest timer between sets with automatic countdown and skip option
- Removed streak tracking from quick stats
- Changed edit buttons to editable input fields for reps/duration
- Removed date filtering from history feature
- Removed database architecture section (will be addressed in tech spec)
- Removed system diagrams section (will be addressed in tech spec)
- Updated responsive design to focus on mobile only (375px-430px)
- Removed open questions and future enhancements sections
- Renumbered all sections for clarity

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
